name: CURSE: The Game
description:
Have you ever heard of Trevor Henderson?

Well, Trevor Henderson is a Canadian artist that creates interesting creatures such as Siren Head, Cartoon Cat, Long Horse and any other 128 more creatures. But, what if his creatures came to life? What if its a horror game? Let us find out...

NOTE: Im just a basic programmer, and this project is very early. Stay tuned for updates!
